name: Airplane Cats vs Rats FREE - Tiny Flying Angry Air Battle Game
name_original: Airplane Cats vs Rats FREE - Tiny Flying Angry Air Battle Game
description:
Airplane Cats vs Rats - The epic MULTIPLAYER war is ON! :-D

War has been raging for centuries in the air between Cats and Rats. This is YOUR time to take CONTROL and finish it for good.

Take to the skies as Copter Cat in this awesome airborne battle and finally rid the world of those pesky rats in planes once and for all.

Just watch out for the deadly Iron Birds!

• Epic real time multiplayer action
• Awesome 3D graphics
• Easy one finger controls

See other players in real time on screen!

Download RIGHT NOW for FREE.
